name: Timberland Skyla Bay Fleece Fold-Down Boots - Women's
description:
Soft and warm sneakers that give you options. Whether you wear the cuffs of your Skyla Bay up for extra warmth and that sky-high high-top look, or down to keep it casual, your feet will be comfy and cozy all-day long.Leather upper, sourced from a tannery rated Silver or higher by a third-party environmental audit. The Leather Working Group judges and classifies tanneries based on energy use, waste production and water treatment.Fleece liners made from ReBOTL™ fabric that wick moisture away from the foot.EVA footbed provides stability and all-day support.Grippy and durable rubber tread.Uses Timberland’s ReBOTL material that contains at least 50% recycled plastic, mainly from plastic bottles. To date Timberland has helped more than 500 metric tons of plastic waste find new life in their products.

        Sustainability









                      Leather Working Group leather
